title: Nutrition: the consumer and the supermarket
creator_credit: Barr Films and William C. Crain
brief_description: The supermarket offers convenience and a ready source of the food we need. But there are thousands of products on the supermarket shelves - how do we determine what to buy? Here consumer interviews are combined with an analysis of the products and merchandising techniques used in the market. Basic information is presented to assist the shopper.
